faq.question: What is Epic Go-Live?
faq.answer: Epic Go-Live is the transition period when Epic is launched in production for all users.

faq.question: Who do I contact for support?
faq.answer: Please contact the Go-Live Command Center or your assigned Super User.

faq.question: Can I still use the old scheduling system?
faq.answer: No, all scheduling must be completed in Epic after Go-Live.

faq.question: How do I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
faq.answer: Use the Epic Scheduling module and follow the cancellation workflow provided in training.
